summary: Master-file converter is a tiny but very useful for modmakers program that converts .esp files to .esm and back only in one click.
descriptionHtml:
Master-file converter is a tiny but very useful for modder`s program that converts .esp files to .esm and back only in one click.

To convert just simply select a file in the dialog box.

The program is autonomous, work from any directory, as well as defines the installation directory of the game, opening a data folder to select files
author: apenov
